title: american horror story coven - cordelia gets acid thrown at her face
author: ONCEUPON a HORRORSTORY
comment: Who else hated how coredlia was treated? Perfect example of a person being nice and being taken advantage of all the time by everyone
Even though they weren't close you could just feel the fear Fiona felt. The absolute terror and jarring fear of hearing and knowing your child is in immense pain. It's awful.
Seeing Sarah cry makes me cry
I was so angry and sad watching this scene... I was literally crying... She didn't deserve that! She's so nice
This is my favourite scene the bond between Cordelia and Fiona.
description:
american horror story coven - Cordelia and Fiona go drinking  / Cordelia gets acid thrown at her face 
3x5 burn witch burn
